snippet.title: Up & Away Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Up & Away is a casual indie game where you only need one button to control your ship. Use platforms to gain horizontal momentum and press buttons to unlock new pathways to reach your goal.

This is the release date trailer.

Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2158710/Up__Away/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/Volatilethegame
